metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1053 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In crypt.c of remote-login-service, the cryptographic algorithm used to cache usernames and passwords is insecure. An attacker could use this vulnerability to recover usernames and passwords from the file. This issue affects version 1.0.0-0ubuntu3 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: remote-login-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
